summary: When circus clown Sunny gets transformed into a super-powered mutant, he finds himself pitted against his fellow performers, who were altered in the same accident, and who are now using their powers to wreak havoc around the city.
cast: Aaron Kwok|Qi Shu|Jing Wu|Jingchu Zhang|Chrissie Chau|Mo-Chan Chik|Chun-sing Chiu|Collin Chou|Chi-Kui Fong|Seung-him Ho|Elanne Kong|Kibby Lau|Yau-Kuen Law|Pak-wun Lee|Simon Lee|Sun-Him Lee|Man-Wai Luk|Nan Tie|Chik-Chi Tsim|Terence Tsui|Cake Wong|Chi-Yin Wong|Terence Yin|Wah Yuen|Jacob J Ziacan
title: Chun sing gai bei
